title: Ep. 805 - Fight Or Flight For Freedom
description:
Texas Democrats flee the state in an effort to stall election integrity bills, Robin DiAngelo’s new “anti-racist” book flops, and elite liberals defend socialism against Cuban protesters.
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ
